description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface includes virtual callback functions for handling container lifecycle events, such as starting, stopping, failing, and state changes, each accepting a JsonObject reference as parameter.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface for handling container events in the plugin system

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has started, with event data as a JSON object

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has stopped, with event data as a JSON object

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has failed, with event data as a JSON object

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container changes state, with event data as a JSON object
